example.title: Simple VSPX Page
example.para: The fragment below shows us a VSPX page with a few labels. A label is a simple control that renders as HTML text, using a data bindable attribute to specify a value and a C printf style format string for the format. Note the use of the <?vsp ?> processing instruction. This could just as well have been an HTML literal.
